name: MiWorld
description:
After dropping down to this tiny planet you discovered deep in space, you find it infested with many monsters swarming in to attack you! Use your advanced mech suit to survive in an extremely varying environment while you wait for your backup to arrive!

Utilise the environment in different biomes using the power of your mech suit to channel the natural energies and shape your weapon! Use the unique aspects of each variation to fend off hordes of zombies, as well as take down unique monsters using strategy to choose the most effective weapon!
